review: Fantastic device. It doesn't stream home videos or certain music files, but I haven't had any problems streaming Netflix, Hulu, or Youtube. I can cast my Nexus 7 screen without any issues. The image is crystal clear, and I haven't had any issues with the device.
author: Jack Brown

review: Product was what I expected and arrived wat before I thought it was going to.
author: Samantha

review: This is absolute garbage and a complete waste of $ .... Don't buy this
author: Borimami B.

review: I really enjoy using the Chromecast HDMI Streaming Media Player for my television. There is no need for a long HDMI cord which is nice so people aren't tripping over it. I recommend this product anyone that doesn't have cable or any other tv network system. It works wonders and doesn't cost me an arm and a leg to watch programs, shows, movies as with the satellite I used to have.
author: peggielinn

review: I love this thing! That is all.
author: Stephanie M Soper
